item.description:
Hey folks I will be sailing Saturday at 1 PM from the Nantasket beach saltwater club (3 Fitzpatrick Way in Hull. We will be out for 4 or 5 hours. I have five spots open. I will give preference to folks who have sailed with me before. In the past I have found that no shows are a problem with this website. I will need you to e mail me if your available and if for any reason you have to cancel let me know so I can give your spot to someone else. I will e mail you individual confirmations so you know if youâ€™re in. Water and some soda is on board, snacks to share are always appreciated. segallagheresq@comcast.net

Forecast for Saturday...Sunny. Highs in the upper 70s. East winds 10 to 15 mph.
item.name: Sail a Merritt 25 from Hull to the light houses
